attributes.action: Get rid of GCSE's. They are outdated and very stressful.
attributes.additional_details: From the start of year 9 students like me have to start learning things that a lot find very complicated and tricky. I wish we could introduce a system where we dont have to stress over memorising topics we wont need in our lives.Who needs to know adding and subtracting standard form? Only a mathmetician and I know that I dont want to do that and I will forget how to do it very quickly.
attributes.background: I want to enjoy learning well guess what I can't because In a few years time I have to sut an exam which in order to pass I have to memorise heaps of information which most I will never use again
